title: Small text controllers cannot read controllers cannot read
content:
interesting article on air controllers not being able to distinguish the numbers 0, 8 and 6.   
   
 [http://news.bbc.co.uk/hi/english/uk/newsid\_1936000/1936464.stm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019175400/http:/news.bbc.co.uk/hi/english/uk/newsid_1936000/1936464.stm)
author: Michael Surtees
